battleDispositions.label: Charge
battleDispositions.description: You burst into the fray with unrelenting aggression, striking first and hard. Your intent is to overwhelm your foes before they can react.

battleDispositions.label: Withdraw
battleDispositions.description: You keep your distance—ideal for ranged fighters and area‑of‑effect casters—harassing enemies from afar and striking when they step into your zone of control.

battleDispositions.label: Hold
battleDispositions.description: You brace yourself and stand your ground, observing your opponent’s moves and conserving your strength for the perfect counterattack.
